      • addRequest

        public boolean addRequest​(Long chatId,
                          long epochSecond,
                          String url2,
                          BufferedImage screenshot,
                          String siteContentHash)
        This function inserts a request into database
        Parameters:
        chatId - Telegram Id of the user who made the request
        epochSecond - Unix timestamp of the moment request created
        url2 - Address of the webpage user wants to check
        screenshot - Screenshot of the webpage
        siteContentHash - Content hash of the webpage
        Returns:
        True if Request has been added successfully, false otherwise

        telegramId - Id of the User
        Returns:
        True if deletion is successfull, false otherwise

      • fixPragmaWAL

        private boolean fixPragmaWAL()
        Fixed the journal mode pragma of the database Write-Ahead Logging is used instead of the standard rollback journal. This means that when database data is updated, the original content is preserved in the database file, and the changes are appended into a separate WAL file and eventually are transferred to the database.
        Returns:

        Returns:
        True if the Request is active, false otherwise
